revision.text:
{{Codepointer|r=Hexen|Spawn}} '''A_FSwordFlames'''
(''no parameter'')
Spawns 1-4 {{Class|FSwordFlame}} actor(s) with offsets of 0-8 units from the calling actor on the x and y axis and 0-4 units on the z axis. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FSwordMissile}} and derived classes.
